steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Leather';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT wip_id FROM wip_material WHERE origin_material_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the WIP material IDs that require the material "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id IN ('8');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that produce the WIP materials using "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE ct.id IN ('5', '11', '16', '24', '27', '31', '32');
steps.description: Retrieve the details of cutting tasks that use "Leather"

response:

| 11      | March 2, 2024       | March 21, 2024      | Expert Cutters    |
| 16      | March 11, 2024      | April 10, 2024      | Expert Cutters    |
| 24      | March 25, 2024      | April 23, 2024      | Master Cutters    |
| 27      | April 14, 2024      | May 4, 2024         | Expert Cutters    |
| 31      | May 10, 2024        | May 26, 2024        | Master Cutters    |
| 32      | June 1, 2024        | June 17, 2024       | Master Sewers     |
